subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Stephon Marbury scored a season-high 43 points, almost single-handedly carrying the Knicks to an improbable victory. But he was left forlorn by his shortcomings in the waning moments.
snippet: Stephon Marbury scored a season-high 43 points, almost single-handedly carrying the Knicks to an improbable victory. But he was left forlorn by his shortcomings in the waning moments.
